original_text: At that time, people will come from everywhere in the world, from the east and from the west, from the north and from the south. They will all come to take their place in the kingdom of God. There they will sit down together to eat a great meal.
korean_text: 사람들이 동서남북으로부터 와서 하나님의 나라 잔치에 참여하리니

sentences.original_text: people will come from everywhere in the world
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 세상 모든 곳에서 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from the east and from the west
from the north and from the south
to take their place in the kingdom of God
There they will sit down together
